queries.insertQuery: INSERT INTO TEST_TABLE (FIELD_1, FIELD_2, FIELD_3, FIELD_4, FIELD_5) values (@p0, @p1, @p2, @p3, @p4)
queries.updateQuery: UPDATE TEST_TABLE SET FIELD_1 = @p0, FIELD_2 = @p1, FIELD_3 = @p2, FIELD_4 = @p3, FIELD_5 = @p4 WHERE (FIELD_1 = @p5 and FIELD_2 = @p6 and FIELD_3 = @p7 and FIELD_4 = @p8 and FIELD_5 = @p9)
queries.selectQuery: SELECT FIELD_1, FIELD_2, FIELD_3, FIELD_4, FIELD_5 FROM TEST_TABLE ORDER BY FIELD_1 ASC
